meanings.definition: To make a series of light, high-pitched sounds
meanings.sent1: The birds were twittering happily in the trees.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the twittering of the sparrows outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The twittering of the birds sounded like a cheerful morning song.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, twittering like a melody.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the wind through the leaves was like gentle twittering.

meanings.definition: The activity of posting short messages or updates on the social media platform Twitter
meanings.sent1: Her constant twittering on social media kept her followers engaged.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the twittering of my favorite celebrities.
meanings.sent3: The non-stop twittering on my feed made me feel overwhelmed.
meanings.sent4: The twittering on Twitter never seems to stop, even late at night.
meanings.sent5: The constant twittering on social media can be addictive.
